name: The ZERO Countdown
description:
A mysterious storm ad brought the USS Enterprise back trough time from 1981 to December 7, 1941. Is now your chance to stop the attack on Pearl Harbour! 

Not really... the game is actually endless ;)

Arrow keys or ASWD to move, spacebar to Shoot.

Jump aboard your F14 and shoot down as many Zeros as you can!

GOOD HUNTING!
